Articles.Content: Why does the loading screen say stuff like biding time, motivating Kerbals, recruiting Kerbals, untangling space tape, locating Jebediah Kerman (< oh god) calculating ultimate answer, and adding more boosters?

Why does the loading screen say stuff like biding time, motivating Kerbals, recruiting Kerbals, untangling space tape, locating Jebediah Kerman (< oh god) calculating ultimate answer, and adding more boosters?

it's like the sims series (The sims, simcity etc...) probably they get the idea from there
Reticulating splines should be one. Just because. heh
"Adding K to every word" was either Novasilisko being funny or something designed to piss Nova off. Either way, thumbs up!

Courage and stupidity? I doubt Jeb actually has an even amount of both, it's probably actually full courage, but maybe a very tiny bit of stupidity at times... *screams at the engineers to get Jeb off the srb*

Recruiting Kerbals.... Motivating kerbals.....

I love the devs.
Lol me too, this game has made me laugh the most out of every other game XD
It's a trend started by Maxis in The Sims franchise. Don't take them too seriously now!
I saw it originally on the early days of Everquest..my fav "Sanding WoodElves"

"treating Kessler syndrome"

"getting to a safe distance"

"pointing correct end towards space"

I love you guys lol!

"Adding K to every word" was either Novasilisko being funny or something designed to piss Nova off. Either way, thumbs up!

I laughed really hard when I saw that one. There's no way that one went through Nova-approval.

I laughed really hard when I saw that one. There's no way that one went through Nova-approval.

? I'm confused, does nova knot klike kus kputting ka k kin kevery kword?
I got folders/parts/%/stack bicoupler or something along those lines.

[log]: 1 explosions created

[log]: liquidEngine Exploded!! - blast awesomeness: 0.5

[log]: [Explosion] combined

[log]: fuelTank.long Exploded!! - blast awesomeness: 0.5

Oh god I can't breath I think I'm suffocating a bit XD im laughing so hard right now

[log]: Should have Jettisoned

XD

They should have added "Resurrecting Jebediah... again!".

It's Maxis style, and I'm adding Spore.

It's kinda a joke.
"Locating Jeb" and "adding K to every word" are the best
Combobulating discombobulater!
'Packing Sandwiches' should be one XD
How about "waking the space kraken"?

Reticulating splines should be one. Just because. heh

Ah, SPORE. First game I ever played. To bad Maxis stopped working on it.

Ah, SPORE. First game I ever played. To bad Maxis stopped working on it.

Anyone see the "Mun castle" easter egg in one of the title screens? I didn't see that in 0.19

-RODION

Ah, SPORE. First game I ever played. To bad Maxis stopped working on it.
